value.title: Share Power BI reports and apps with external guests for free - Azure B2B
value.excerpt: In todays video, I am going to show you how you can share power bi reports, dashboards, apps with external guests for free. (there are 3 licensing options for this).  Link to Power BI B2B docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/admin/service-admin-azure-ad-b2b  Link to publish to web limitations:

value.title: Store data from PowerApps in sql, approve it in flow and use it in Power bI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will create a PowerApp that will store stopwords in a SQL table on an on-prem server. The PowerApp will log the user of the app and a timestamp. After the stopword is sent to sql, a flow will be started to approve the new word. The data will then be imported in Power BI where the

This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop

value.excerpt: If you use Power BI Bookmarks you may not have used the advanced bookmarking options for  ➔ Bookmark Data ➔ Bookmark Display  ➔ Bookmark Current Page I talk about these options and show you were these can really help you out when using Power BI Bookmarks in advanced scenarios.  ================================

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SlQJaryCLy4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to Create Power BI Account without a Work Email 📧 (Use Gmail/Outlook/Hotmail)
value.excerpt: Have you tried creating a PowerBI.com account online but got stuck because you did not have a Work Email? Let me show you the best workaround you can use, to create a Power BI account if you just have a Gmail, Outlook or Hotmail address.  ➔ Links mentioned in the Video ▪️ Power BI Tutorial From Beginner
